subject: Halls of Fame
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: From its bootlegging roots to the racecar Jimmie Johnson drove to the 2008 title, Nascar finally has a home for its admittedly short history.
snippet: From its bootlegging roots to the racecar Jimmie Johnson drove to the 2008 title, Nascar finally has a home for its admittedly short history.
